Posts.Content: usually on the ms panel, but recently got troubling symptoms in my right breast. began as itching, but chalked it up to a different bra. switched to totally bland one, but itching continued. a red oval area surrounding nipple developed with heat, stabbing pain. by pure luck called the office of my primary and got a doctor. awaiting call back from the staff on when i can be seen asap. linda
Posts.Title: Is this a Symptom of IBC?

Posts.Content: had the same suspicious arrangement of microcalcifications in my left breast some years ago.... had choice of waiting and watching or having them out. was to be a needle biopsy, but they wound up taking a piece the size of an egg to remove them. still have them, but no change has been seen in some years. linda
Posts.Title: Calcification in Breast
